statuses.unverified.info: Only your company can mark a user as “Rejected”. Mati will only mark a user as “verified” or “manual review”.
statuses.verified.info: Mati recommends to accept the user since  nothing suspicious was found in the verification.
statuses.inProgress.info: Mati is still verifying the user, and the verification is not done yet.
statuses.manual.info: At least one flag was raised during the verification. Some of our flags: liveness, face match, document alteration, global watchlists, and more.

plan.details.new-features.title: New features
plan.details.safety-pro.description: Comply with the highest standards of security. We provide with access to multiple database searches directly integrated into our system. Fully automated, and plug-and-play.
plan.details.liveness.description: Are your users alive or just a photo? After comparing the face match between the photo and the ID, our proprietary computer vision algorithm verifies that there is a real person on the other side, not just a photo or a even a video. Safety first.
plan.details.new-features.description: Direct line of communication to our Product Engineering Team. You want a special feature and you want it ASAP? Let us know!

developers.webhook.form.description: The webhook is the way to receive the verification information on your backend. You will receive all user information: images of selfie & documents, document information (full name, document number, face match, and more), liveness score, global watchlist, etc... With this information on your backend, you will be able to fully automate your verifiation flow.

A field was missing on the document & document got flagged on doc authenticity

fragments.verification_detail.mati_check: Contains the proof of life response, making sure your user is a real person (and not a printed paper)
Will return fields read from the document: full name, date of birth, document number, etc...
Checks that the presented document revision is valid.
Checks that the document was not altered.
Face match performed between document face & user's face.

fragments.info.faq-panel.title: Mati FAQ
fragments.integration.webhooks-test-pane: Go to webhook.site
Copy your test Webhook URL from the webhook.site
Paste your test Webhook URL into the field “Add webhook” inside the “Applications Keys” page of your Mati dashboard
Go through our SDK verification flow and observe your webhook results on the webhook.site
User verification data will be contained inside the webhook’s resource URL
fragments.integration.webhooks-docs-pane: You receive the users verification information via webhooks
fragments.integration.installation-guide: Configure your identity verification flow by choosing the documents that you want to verify. You can also customize the color, language, and more.
Our application keys give you access to the URL for your receiving webhooks, your client ID, and a Permalink.
You need to install our frontend code to your platform. Currently we support JavaScript and React.js.
Here you can test your webhooks and look at webhook documentation
Check out this short presentation with step by step instructions to integrate our product.

Pricing.notification.success: Card was saved to your account
SecurityCheckStep.alteration-detection.f: Document shows signs of tampering or attempted fraud. Mati cannot validate the document's authenticity.
SecurityCheckStep.facematch.title: Facematch
SecurityCheckStep.facematch.failure: The faces in the document and the user’s video/selfie are different. This can also be the result of poor lightning, blurriness, or flash on the ID card.
SecurityCheckStep.template-matching.fail: There was no match with any valid revisions of the document.
SecurityCheckStep.watchlists.title: Watchlist
SecurityCheckStep.watchlists.failure: The user’s name was found in a watchlist.
fragments.verifications.help-messages.li: Checks proof of life. The response contains a selfie video that ensures your user is a real person.
The person behind the camera is alive.
Mati detected a potential fraud. The person behind the camera does not appear to be alive.
fragments.verifications.help-messages.fa: Checks that the user’s selfie and the document’s face match.
It is the same face in both the picture (from the document) and the user’s face.
The faces did not correspond with each other (two different faces).
fragments.verifications.help-messages.al: Checks that the document was not altered (i.e. document was edited by Photoshop)
fragments.verifications.help-messages.te: Checks that the document matches with a legally valid revision
Document is not valid or a different document was uploaded
fragments.verifications.help-messages.wa: Checks if the user’s name is inside a watchlist. If a match was found, you should perform a more extensive due diligence on that user
The users name is was not found in any watch-lists (international or local)
The users name was found in one or multiple watch-lists (international or local)

StatesExplanation.verified.label: Verified
StatesExplanation.verified.text: When the user finished the verification flow and there were no errors on any of the steps.
StatesExplanation.reviewNeeded.label: Review Needed
StatesExplanation.reviewNeeded.text: When the user finished the verification flow and there is an error, for example, Biometric check failed. You should double-check the verification results.
StatesExplanation.running.label: Running
StatesExplanation.running.text: When the user has completed the verification and Mati is reviewing it.
StatesExplanation.rejected.label: Rejected
StatesExplanation.rejected.text: Only you as a merchant can edit a verification status and change it to “rejected”. Mati does not reject users.

Product.LegalService.q3: Who regulates my company? Are there multiple entities
Product.LegalService.q4: How do we scale internationally and stay compliant?
Product.LegalService.q5: How should we handle user PII?
Product.LegalService.q6: What do we need to do to be GDPR compliant?
Product.LegalService.q7: Our bank wants proof of AML compliance, what do I send them?
Product.LegalService.side.title: Here’s our answer on all these questions
Product.LegalService.side.subtitle: One of the compliance lawyers at Mati will:
Product.LegalService.side.q1: Show you which regulations apply to your business (depending on your industry, your exact service, and in what country you operate)
Product.LegalService.side.q2: List the exact regulations that your business needs to comply with (storage, encryption, reporting, data privacy, etc...)
Product.LegalService.side.q3: Perform a “regulatory gap analysis” for your business, so that you understand what rules you still need to implement
Product.LegalService.side.q4: Provide you with the regulator's exact reporting templates
Product.LegalService.side.q5: Make sure you stay compliant over time (legal updates)
flow.colorStep.description: Here you can set color of your mati button. It will affect on color of elements inside verification also.
Product.LegalService.form.title: Let's talk about you
Product.LegalService.form.subtitle: Our team is happy to answer your questions. Fill out the form and we'll be in touch as soon as possible.
feedbacks.feedback.2.content: Mati is a key component in our infrastructure, because it allows us to identify and prevent fraud, and with that we can greatly mitigate our operational risks.
feedbacks.feedback.2.author: Salvador Melendez CEO, Coinbtr
feedbacks.feedback.3.content: Finally! An Identity platform I love. Mati is a super important part of our UX
feedbacks.feedback.3.author: Artak Hamazaspyan, CEO/Founder at Beaxy Exchange
PricingPlans.support: Instant support via Discord or Slack
EndToEndCompliance.title: Complete compliance package
EndToEndCompliance.t1: Get Step-by-Step help from our legal team in filing reports, protecting user data & privacy, and more.
EndToEndCompliance.t2: Get in touch with our staff to go through a quick evaluation process and start the process of forgetting about compliance once and for all!
flow.documentTypeStep.biometric.title: Set biometric requirements
flow.documentTypeStep.biometric.subtitle: With Mati, you have the freedom to choose between different types of biometric checks. If you select “liveness”, your users will need to record a 5 seconds selfie video. It will make two checks: liveness and face match. If you select only the “selfie” option, your users will only need to take a selfie picture, and Mati will return a face match score.

apps.integration.documentation.title: 1. Integration keys
apps.integration.documentation.subtitle: We work hard to make the integration fast. It usually takes a few minutes to integrate our SDKs, and couple hours to integrate our webhook.
apps.integration.api.title: API
apps.integration.api.subtitle: You have a special use case and cannot integrate our SDKs? we have an API for that!
apps.integration.websdk.title: Web SDK
apps.integration.websdk.subtitle: Integrate our Web SDK in seconds into any website. Optimised for desktop & mobile.
apps.integration.mobilesdk.title: Mobile SDKs
apps.integration.mobilesdk.subtitle: If you have native or hybrid Apps, our Mobile SDKs are here for you. Integration takes a few lines of code.
apps.integration.permalink.title: Direct Verification Link
apps.integration.permalink.subtitle: Send that link to verify users via SMS, email, Intercom, or any other way. Always the simplest way to start!
apps.integration.webhook.title: Webhook Documentation
apps.integration.webhook.subtitle: Mati transmits all the user verification information via a secured webhook, directly to your backend.
apps.integration.webhookform.title: Webhook URL and Secret
apps.integration.webhookform.subtitle: Please enter a webhook URL where Mati will send the user verification data after each verification. The secret will be used to secure the webhook.
